tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The reason for online consultation was lack of availability of doctors on sunday. Paid for video consultation, but he was offline at the time and barely communicated through chat and call. The patient was admitted on sunday and discharged on monday. His prescription came on Wednesday after everything was already settled.  Basically the responce came three days later 
Out of money and time and absolutely not useful in case of emergency.
reply_text:
I am happy today that atleast you replied here on feedback
Kindly ask yourself did you bother to ..
 To reply me on chat.
Send me report after our conversation
You made me wait restlessly throughout the day for reports
Did you bother to call me back and tell me the patient was admitted 
How am I suppose to write a prescription

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Physcian,Blood Pressure Changes,Pre and Post operative conditions,Wellness checkup,Annual health checkup,
review: I had high fever and was extremely anxious due to my exams. I went to Dr. Dhuri. As soon as I walked in he greeted me and made me feel comfortable. Then he asked me a bit about my self to calm me down and then took my temperature. While measuring he told me that I'm fine its just the anxiety that was freaking my out. This gave me a moral boost and I felt courageous. He then prescribed me the medicines and was courteous enough to walk me out of the clinic. He is a not just GREAT DOCTOR but also a GENTLEMAN.
reply_text:
Thanks dear
All the best to you

review: Dr. Harish Dhuri was very helpful when I needed immediate diagnosis for an infection I caught while I was travelling abroad. He also prescribed helpful supplements to help me recuperate and build immunity. He also asked me to get a list of blood tests to check on deficiencies which he later helped me overcome with vitamin & supplements prescription.

review: I can't thank Dr. Harish Dhuri enough for his incredible support during a challenging time. He's not only an expert in his field, but his compassion and approachability are truly outstanding. I'm deeply grateful for his unwavering support and highly recommend him to anyone seeking a caring and knowledgeable doctor.
